buildHighlights: Built as a single-page site using JSON files for all content.
Added interactive sections like the toolkit filter and experience accordion.
Made it easy to read with good colors and keyboard navigation.

buildStack.label: React 16
buildStack.description: Used React components and hooks to build the site.

buildStack.label: React-Bootstrap
buildStack.description: Used Bootstrap components for layout and buttons.

buildStack.label: Bootstrap 4
buildStack.description: Used Bootstrap styles for consistent design.

buildStack.label: PNPM
buildStack.description: Used PNPM to manage packages and dependencies.

buildStack.label: React Icons
buildStack.description: Used React Icons for all the icons you see.

buildStack.label: React Typed
buildStack.description: Used React Typed for the animated text in the hero section.

skillCard.title: Quick skills
skillCard.description: A quick look at the tools I use most.

sections.toolkitDescription: Choose a category to see the skills I use most - from frameworks and languages to testing and tools.
sections.experienceDescription: Here's a look at how I help teams build great products while working with others and staying active.
sections.educationDescription: The learning and experience that helps me build better products.
sections.buildDescription: This site is a single-page React app driven by JSON content. Text and labels come from data files, so updates are quick - no code changes needed.
sections.letsCollaborateDescription: I'm based in New Jersey. If you want to chat about front-end work, side projects, or ideas, feel free to reach out.
sections.ctaTitle: Let's work together on your next project.
sections.ctaDescription: Want to know more or ready to start building? Get in touch and let's create something great together.
